original_text: You are standing here in order to enter into a covenant with the Lord your God, a covenant the Lord is making with you this day and sealing with an oath,
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와의 언약에 참여하며 또 네 하나님 여호와께서 오늘 네게 하시는 맹세에 참여하여

sentences.original_text: in order to enter into a covenant with the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 하나님 주님과 언약을 맺기 위해

sentences.original_text: a covenant the Lord is making with you this day
